H0.text: Phillip Schofield, Jason Donovan and Donny Osmond have all played the starring role in which stage musical. Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat

H1.text: Phillip Schofield, Jason Donovan and Donny Osmond have all played the starring role in which stage musical. Chicago

H2.text: Phillip Schofield, Jason Donovan and Donny Osmond have all played the starring role in which stage musical. Grease

H3.text: Phillip Schofield, Jason Donovan and Donny Osmond have all played the starring role in which stage musical. Jatd

A4.text: When Donovan left, former children's TV presenter Phillip Schofield portrayed Joseph.

A5.text: The musical opened in Toronto at the Elgin Theatre in June, 1992 until September that same year, with Donny Osmond as Joseph and Janet Metz as the Narrator.
